Articles.Content:
Hey, Id like to request for one small edit to the SPH/VAB, an option I have always desired is to have an undo/redo option in the GUI of both buildings.

The option would look very similar to the option currently presented in any common word processor.

Thanks,

Skyler4856
Hitting CTRL+Z should allow you to undo stuff. Be warned though that this is very flaky, more often than not you will likely summon the Kraken for tea.

It doesn't have a GUI button, but the standard(ish) shortcut ctrl+Z does work already. It tends to lag pretty badly though. Redo is either Ctrl+Shift+Z or Ctrl+Y (in the middle of flying a spaceplane, can't check ). A GUI button for that would be nice though
Well, before they make it a GUI option, they have to fix the bugs associated with it. Currently using it has probably a 50/50 chance to totally break anything you've currently got loaded up.
Geez ... I use that CTRL-Z option a lot, used it hundreds of times. Only in 5% of my cases did it create problems. I'm surprised at this news.

I'm guessing as to the actual incidence of messes it can cause, really. I don't have solid statistics to use. I do, however, know for sure that for whatever reason it's worse in 0.90 than it was in previous versions, likely due to the editor being rewritten a fair bit.
